summary: This is an internal email exchange between U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY) personnel regarding Jeffrey Epstein. It discusses vetting consultations of Special Counsel's Office records and indicates a call was held with an unnamed individual about Epstein, with plans to update a memo to reflect a 'new posture'.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Recipient of an email discussing the Epstein case and vetting consultations of SCO records.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email discusses a call about Epstein and plans to update a memo regarding his case.

connections.description: Strauss is part of the U.S. Attorney's Office discussing the legal posture and vetting of records related to Epstein's case.

events.title: Call regarding Epstein case
events.description: An unnamed individual had a call with an unnamed person about Jeffrey Epstein and was advised about the case.

events.title: Email discussion on Epstein case posture
events.description: Internal email exchange at USAO SDNY about updating a memo to reflect a new posture in the Epstein case and vetting SCO records.

keyFacts: The email discusses vetting consultations of Special Counsel's Office (SCO) records with U.S. Attorney's Offices regarding the Epstein case.
A call was held with an unnamed individual about Epstein, and they were advised about the case.
The U.S. Attorney's Office planned to work on an updated memo to reflect a 'new posture' in the Epstein case.
The email indicates ongoing internal coordination and communication about the Epstein investigation within the USAO SDNY in June 2019.
